description:
Merda Dietz is a fighter pilot of the Gamilas Empire in the Gamilas Empire Milky Way area 707th military air wing. Her rank is second lieutenant.
She is the daughter of Admiral Gal Deitz, supreme commander of the imperial spacefleet. Born into a proud military family, she values honor above all. As a pilot with the skill of an ace, she flies the red Tsvuelke, which is her cherished machine.
name: Merda Dietz
